components.description:
An icy-blue face with gritted teeth usually depicted with icicles clinging to its cheeks or jaw, as if frozen from extreme cold. May also represent unfriendliness (slang, cold) or excellence (slang, cool or chill).

title: Freezing Face

version.description:
Unicode 11.0 was released on June 5, 2018. Emojis that require new code points for release are listed on this page but for the full 2018 emoji list see Emoji 11.0.

Emoji 11.0 includes every new emoji, including variations for skin tone, gender and new emojis that don't require additional code points, such as the chess pawn or pirate flag which are not shown on this page.

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the cold face emoji vividly conveys a frosty chill with its pale blue complexion and chattering teeth. Appleâ€™s signature glossy 3D shading adds a subtle sheen to the skin, while the soft rounded edges of the face and subtle wrinkles around the eyes enhance its expressive realism. This emoji is perfect for communicating feelings of being freezing, unwell, or experiencing a significant drop in temperature, all rendered with Apple's characteristic warmth and clarity.
